content: 20 sl1 p13 p2tog m1p continue in this manner k2tog or p2tog the 1st before the gap and 1st after the gap together and then m1k or m1p in the stitch under the k2tog or p2tog stitch and turning until… row 36 sl1 p28 turn row 37 *k7 m1l* to 7sts before the end then k2 4sts increased there are now 34sts on needle 1 then rejoin cc and working back in the round continue knitting the colourwork chart using needles 1 and 2 3 pattern copyright charlotte stone stoneknits 2019 for personal use only medium size only row 1 *k6 k2tog * 4 times decreases 4sts now 32sts total on needle 1 there are 4 remaining sts knit 3 sts and turn sock to the ws purl side there was one remaining last stitch unworked row 2 sl1 p29 leaving again 1 stitch unworked at the end and turn sock to the rs knit side row 3 sl1 k28 this leaves 2sts not unworked at the end and turn sock to the ws purl side row 4 sl1 p27 you are turning at the last stitch before the gap row 5 sl1 k26 turning the stitch before the gap row 6 sl1 p25 turning the stitch before the gap continue the knit and purl sides slipping 1st and turning work at the stitch before the gap ending on… row 20 sl1 p11 turn you will have 10 unworked sts on the left side and 10 unworked sts on the right side of your 12 purl sts the heel now needs to be worked back and forth closing the gaps that have been created from turning the work row 21 sl1 k10 k2tog this is 1st before the gap and 1st after the gap knitted together m1k stitch picking up the stitch under the k2tog stitch *please see diagram a do not twist the stitch turn work to ws purl side row 22 sl1 p11 p2tog again 1st before the gap and 1st after the gap purled together m1p stitch in the stitch under the p2tog stitch **please see diagram b do not twist stitch turn work to rs knit side row 23 sl1 k12 k2tog m1k row 24 sl1 p13 p2tog m1p continue in this manner k2tog or p2tog the 1st before the gap and 1st after the gap together and then m1k or m1p in the stitch under the k2tog or p2tog stitch and turning until… row 40 sl1 p31 turn row 41 *k8 m1l* increasing 4sts there are now 36sts on needle 1 then rejoin cc and working back in the round continue knitting the colourwork chart using needles 1 and 2 large size only row 1 *k7 k2tog * 4 times k1 now 34sts total on needle 1 turn to the ws purl side there was one remaining last stitch unknitted row 2 sl1 p31 leaving again 1 stitch unworked at the end and turn sock to the rs knit side row 3 sl1 k30 this
